name: Nimbus Data
overview: Nimbus Sustainable StorageÂ® provides the most intelligent and efficient solid state storage platform to enable enterprises and datacenters to solve storage performance and associated operating cost challenges. Nimbus Sustainable Storage systems, including the modular S-Class system and the cloud-scale E-Class system, represent a revolutionary departure from spinning disk arrays, delivering purpose-built all-flash storage with comprehensive unified storage management and data protection software built-in.
